title: Gender Imbalance in Responsible Investing, Goldman Refusing Non-Diverse IPOs
itunes:title: Gender Imbalance in Responsible Investing, Goldman Refusing Non-Diverse IPOs
description:
Bloomberg News Financial Regulation Reporter Jesse Westbrook shares his insight on a MiFID policy change. Bloomberg News ESG Reporter Alastair Marsh breaks down the gender imbalance in responsible investing. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Global Business Reporter Ira Boudway discuss Nets owner Joe Tsai's explanation for the abrupt exit of the company’s CEO. Bloomberg News Diversity Reporter Jeff Green walks through Goldman refusing non-diverse IPOs. And we Drive to the Close with George Mateyo, Chief Investment Officer at Key Private Bank.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.


See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
